topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ea49686368723671730000#post_53ea49686368723671730000
Yeah; that's who I'm thinking of.


Looking "cool" is not the same thing as something being evolutionary viable.  Pandas look cute, but they're on the verge of extinction.

In order for life to live on Mars or such they would have be to Bear Grylls levels of resilient; piss drinking not included.

1. what about games that dont sell hard copies?

2. what if i live in a place where hard copies are limited since they focus in AAA titles in consoles?.

im just saying you simply are not forced to give money to a game that you dont like at all, if you want to give it a test using a pirated copy and see if you enjoy it before buying it is ok.

or if you are planning to buy it in the future but cant wait to play it.
